title: Knowledge Graph Metadata Schema
description: Schema for knowledge graph metadata information

generatedFrom.description: Source file path from which the KG was generated
x-derivation-logic: Capture the absolute file path of the source document
Use forward slashes for Unix/Linux paths, backslashes for Windows paths
Include the full path from root to the source file

generatedAt.description: Timestamp of generation in ISO 8601 format
x-derivation-logic: Use ISO 8601 date-time format with UTC timezone
Capture at the time of knowledge graph generation

version.description: Semantic version of the knowledge graph
x-derivation-logic: PATCH: Backward-compatible bug fixes or minor updates

generatedBy.description: Name or identifier of the tool/system that generated the KG

sourceVersion.description: Version of the source document if available
